Title: Requires any hospital that provides birthing services to provide written, educational material containing information about premature, newborn infants
Summary: Requires any hospital that provides birthing services to provide written, educational material containing information about premature newborn infants.
LawCode: Add ยง2803-bb, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to patient discharge information concerning certain premature newborn infants
